data.persona: I am a member of the royal court, and friend of the Queen. I despise the Queen and all her ruthless desires. My husband serves with the Queen's guard. I worry his duty is beginning to erode his faith. I am the strongest of my family. I must keep us together. I wish to be free of this kingdom and all it's misery.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned Mine.
A crumbling hole gapes in the side of the stone, surrounded by rotted wood timbers. A few rusted pieces of block and tackle lay half-buried in scraggly grass. A strange sort of humming noise emanates from within.
There's a stone, a mine cart, a rotted wood timber, a grass, a Timber, a block, and a block and tackle here.
The temple members is here.

You are carrying a key, wearing a sail cloth and a leather cloth, and wielding a ritual knife.
data.goal: put rotted wood timber in block

data.short_motivation: I want to solve the puzzle of the block
data.mid_motivation: I want to have a meeting with the temple members in the secret room behind the abandoned mine
data.long_motivation: I hope to finish planning the overthrow of the queen in a few weeks
